name: Rich Uncle: A Gay Adventure
description:
Life sometimes takes unexpected turns. That's what Leo, a young gay boy growing up in a remote village in Finland, must have thought when he receives a letter from an uncle unknown to him, who decides to leave him his immense fortune. But there is one condition, the boy must embark on a journey that will take him, by passing various tests, all over Europe. Will you embark on this adventure? Will you make new friends? Will you explore your sexuality? The choices are many, and they are all in your hands.
Features:
- + 13000 words
- Choose the name of the Mc
- Music and sounds effects
- Replay gallery
- Ren'Py Engine
